author: Austin Szilagyi
comment: I wanted a minimalist look with some extra features, but every watch face I found seemed to either not be as customizable as I'd like or used low resolution watch hands/text and it was very noticeable to my perfectionist eye. This is truly the absolute best watch face app I have found for Android wear with the perfect amount of customizability as well as great visual aspects. Will never uninstall this face.
title: Absolute perfection

author: sirsquirrel0
comment: This is the nuts. There is so much to choose from in the realms of customisation and the ambient lighting looks brilliant too. Good work. Only suggested improvement is; I cannot see how to add steps onto the circles - if you could do this, even better. Thanks
title: Awesome

author: Sina Sharifi-Raini
comment: Not sure what it is syncing with but it's saying 20k+ when all my other apps are saying 2k. The rest is fine, I was skeptical at first but you can really add your style and look unique yet classy.
title: Step counter is off by a magnitude of 10

author: Samiran Bhattacharya
comment: Would be nice if the digital clock can be put in 24 hour mode. Also cards are translucent background which make them hard to read
title: Some limitations

author: Nate Nakao
comment: Constantly crashes on open. Used to be my favorite watch face, now the app doesn't even work.

author: Michał Ulaski
comment: Was looking for a good watch face for last 1,5 month. I think I will stay with this one for a while.  I only hope that dev will provide support for complications (unleass it is already there)

author: John Robinson
comment: Good app although I can't see my watch hour and minute hands when the screen dims! Strange bug.
title: Nice idea

author: Nick Lorenzo
comment: I just downloaded this yesterday for my Fossil watch that I got for Christmas and it has made my watch crash once. Other than that I love the the nice and simplistic design.
title: Very Nice!

author: Nick C.
comment: "Watch not reachable" problem fixed with latest update, so very happy to restore my original 5 star rating. Thanks!

reply.author: Zuhanden
reply.content: Nick, we issued a new release (1.1.4) which should be live within the next hours. Could you please let me know whether you continue to experience problems. Thx, Hans

title: Great watch face

author: Leko Fraggle
comment: So, this does make a nice watch face, and it seems to use power more efficiently than most custom faces, but you have few options of customization like no ability to have an accurate minute hand, no custom background etc.  If that is what you want,  look elsewhere.
title: Far from limitless...

author: Jed Dye
comment: Very good quality faces!! Although there are 3 main options missing:  1. Configuration of the ambient mode 2. Steps counter as an option for the small circles 3. 24hr time for the second time!!

author: Gokhan PINAR
comment: Req.: 1) Shades of gray (light, medium, dark) on color palette. 2) Please fix step counter. It shows all time recorded amount of steps rather than daily.
title: Fantastic!

author: John Apel
comment: I love the customization options. The interface is simple yet has many useful features. I love the default faces on the G Watch R, and this is just as good as any of those. Definitely recommend.
title: Nice Watch Face

author: Haider Ali
comment: Thanks for your work but maybe if you can add a custom location for the weather like the Odyssey watch face. I find that to be more reliable, plus I usually have my GPS turned off.

author: Sergey Vasiliev
comment: 4 stars, definitely will give 5 if you can add (a) combined indicator for phone and watch in digital and analog mode (b) second time zone indicator in 12/24 mode (c) first time zone indicator in digital format in 12/24 mode (d) add white colour for highlighting
title: Need some additional customisation options

author: Craig Keidel
comment: Wouldn't mind a few more accessibility functions such as opening up calendar / fit directly through the face - offered on a few others - but definitely the best looking and most customizable faces I've seen.

author: Sherry Corbett
comment: I had purchased this previously, went to set a watch I made and app could not connect to watch. Went to my apps on Google Play and the app was back to .99. I'm all for supporting devs, but come on now

reply.author: Zuhanden
reply.content: Hey Sherry, please let me know your order number. Something must have gone wrong here. Best, Hans

title: Made me buy it twice

author: Terrell Benton
comment: Great looking, it's easy to understand and customize, 95 download five star rating and only 2 one star rating, you know it's a keeper, just flat out awesome..
title: Simple yet excellent

comment: Would be even better if the digital clock could be switched to 24-hour-mode and we had an option to set the opaque background for the cards... Otherwise - perfect!

author: Andi Darmika
comment: I like this watch face. Can you add setting for ambient mode, because the white part is to bright. Maybe we can adjust the color or simply the brightness for ambient mode.

author: Adrian Burns
comment: At time of writing, this is my fourth watch face from this developer. It looks amazing and has wonderful customisation. My new favourite!
title: Awesome

author: Simon East
comment: Awesome watch face however it states in google play that it does step counter yet it doesnt as far as i can see on moto 360
title: Awesome however 1 fault

author: Okay Google
comment: This developer makes the BEST Android wear watch faces. Being able to disable minimum ambience is what I want. Look forward to next face. Thanks

author: Brian Hines
comment: This seems great, however the watch battery spot on the watch face is showing it at 100% when it is at 70%, not sure why this isn't working but hope they fix it
title: Watch battery

author: Andrew Lau
comment: Like it alot. Has lots of customization options so you can make the perfect watch face to your liking.
title: Good

author: Steven Asher
comment: It's pretty and tells you things... Customizability is pretty good too. Would like more options though.

author: Ian
comment: Eazy to customize, looks great, and has all the right features.  Better than 99% of watch face apps out there.

author: Florent Villard
comment: Nice watch face, some configuration options (not much though), but do the job and do not drain the battery.

author: Ryan Smith
comment: Great simple face, performance is good with smooth animations.  Like the default interactive mode that brings ups simple text info and stats.

author: GAWD AK3CHETA
comment: It is by far the "beautifulest" watch face I had. Customizable with a professional look and simple with a artistic touch!
title: Combo watch face

author: Michael Di Verdi
comment: I wish there was a way to integrate calendar next appointment function on the face.. Particularly from the outlook app
title: Great face options

author: Travis Faubel
comment: Huge hands all zoomed in. M bugfix isn't fixed. Nexus 5 6.0
title: Uninstalled and reinstalled on M

author: Gino B.
comment: I love it but this could use some more customizations.

author: Thomas Billsborrow
comment: Awesome watch face tells me all I want to know in a glance

author: Colby Crowder
comment: Would it be possible to add a completely white background with black accents?
title: Good, but could be better

author: Muhammad shahzad Hanif
comment: Great . I did not see this much characters in any watch face. Thumbs up!

author: James Miller
comment: Wish it had more options for the hands!

author: Amir Masoud
comment: It's good but are not bright,  overall very good

author: Dan Hyde
comment: This app is great. Would be even better with an orange colour option!

author: Maxime Gousse
comment: One of the nicest watch faces out there, I am impressed.
